Author: I_am_Xander
Text: Im really glad you told him, its a big step and you should be proud of yourself, telling someone is hard. He said he understand. He understands. He dont think youre stupid. He said he understands. And if youre still worried i would ask him again and tell him to be 100% honest with what he thinks of it all. Ask him how he feels about it and if he thinks diffrently of you now. Good luck
